<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add a state to a lifecycle configuration."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/governance/lifecycle/configs/{config_id}/states"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new state that objects can be in within this lifecycle.
